title:
I am trying to find an article that appeared in the Star News within the past year(I think)about the history of the Winter Park area of Wilmington.  I thought the article was in response to a question a reader had sent in.  The article talked about the original plans for the area, the streets, the developers, etc.  Can you help me?

Thank you!

Lee Ann
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3946
